title: Eye Health: A Resource List
author: WebMD Editorial Contributors

content: Note: This isn’t a complete list. Nor does a spot on this list equal an endorsement from WebMD. Remember to always follow your doctor and health care team’s advice.

sections.heading: The National Eye Institute (NEI), part of the National Institutes of Health (NIH)
content: www.nei.nih.gov American Foundation for the Blind www.afb.org American Optometric Association www.aoa.org American Academy of Pediatric Ophthalmology and Strabismus www.aapos.org Lighthouse Guild www.lighthouseguild.org EyeCare America www.aao.org/eyecare-america
